# cloudflare_email_routing_rule (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cloudflare_email_routing_rule" "example_email_routing_rule" {
  zone_id = "023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353"
  rule_identifier = "a7e6fb77503c41d8a7f3113c6918f10c"
}
```
